title: Nwoke onye Edmonton adagbuona onwe ya na Cancun
sentences: Ọ na-aga akwụkwọ na mahadum University of Alberta
Ọ dagburu onwe ya na Great Parnassus Resort na Cancun, ebe ya na ndị enyi ya jere ịnwe ezumike
Ozi anyị nwetere na-ekwu na Rogers jere n’ogige ebe a na-agba egwu ndị ntorobia n’ụlọ oriri na nkwari ahụ
Ọ ga-ghachiri n’ọnụ ụlọ nke ya n’ụlọ-elu họtelụ ahụ
A sị n’orima-anya bugideziri ya, o si n’ụlọ-elu dapụ were nwụọ
